-- Megatron --

Megatron's massive dragon form soars through the clouds, tearing up 
the sky as he heads towards Warhead. Soon, his enhanced optics spot 
the locations, Warhead, and several Maximals. "Curses, this might 
take longer than expected..."

He alters course, and swoops down, bursting through a smaller cloud 
and heading straight at the maximal nearest to Warhead's location.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> In the remains of the energon sphere, Warhead's vital components 
> strain to keep him alive...
